channel.title: Graphdb on {code that works}
channel.description: Recent content in Graphdb on {code that works}

item.title: Graph databases 1 - Modeling
item.description: I am making my way through the book Graph Databases 1 which is an introductory book to the subject from Neo Technology 2, creators of Neo4j 3. At work, we are using Neo4j for a cool new thing we are building, and I see it as a great chance to learn some thing new and interesting. In the past, I have gone through a spiral 4 when it comes to learning stuff and the constant feedback I get is to pick something that one gets to work with everyday and dig deep into it, in order to avoid the frustration and the inevitable spiral.
